「浮き輪」「浮き袋・マット」「浮き袋・イルカ」「浮き袋・シャチ」\n「イルカのスーツ」「サメのスーツ」のいずれかのアイテムを持っていると\nその遊具を使って 遊泳が楽しめます
Wenn du einen "Schwimmring", eine "Luftmatratze", ein "Delfinkostüm" oder ein "Haikostüm" hast,\n kannst du diese Gegenstände benutzen, um zu schwimmen.
If you have an "Inner Tube," a "Swimming Float," a "Dolphin Suit" or a "Shark Suit,"\n you can use those items to enjoy swimming.
Si vous avez une "Bouée," un "Flotteur de nage," un "Costume de dauphin" ou un "Costume de requin,"\n vous pouvez utiliser ces objets pour profiter de la nage.
Se hai una "Ciambella", un "Materassino gonfiabile", un "Costume da delfino" o un "Costume da squalo"\n puoi usarli per farti una bella nuotata.
Si tienes un "flotador", un "hinchable", un "traje de delfín" o un "traje de tiburón",\n podrás usar estos objetos para disfrutar nadando.

浮き輪で遊泳をするには 以下のいずれかのアイテムが必要です\n「浮き輪」「浮き袋・マット」「浮き袋・イルカ」「浮き袋・シャチ」\n「イルカのスーツ」「サメのスーツ」
Wenn du einen "Schwimmring", eine "Luftmatratze", ein "Delfinkostüm" oder ein "Haikostüm" hast,\n kannst du diese Gegenstände benutzen, um zu schwimmen.
If you have an "Inner Tube," a "Swimming Float," a "Dolphin Suit" or a "Shark Suit,"\n you can use those items to enjoy swimming.
Si vous avez une "Bouée," un "Flotteur de nage," un "Costume de dauphin" ou un "Costume de requin,"\n vous pouvez utiliser ces objets pour profiter de la nage.
Se hai una "Ciambella", un "Materassino gonfiabile", un "Costume da delfino" o un "Costume da squalo"\n puoi usarli per farti una bella nuotata.
Si tienes un "flotador", un "hinchable", un "traje de delfín" o un "traje de tiburón",\n podrás usar estos objetos para disfrutar nadando.
If you have an "Inner Tube," a "Swimming Float," a "Dolphin Suit" or a "Shark Suit,"\n you can use those items to enjoy swimming.
If you have an "Inner Tube," a "Swimming Float," a "Dolphin Suit" or a "Shark Suit,"\n you can use those items to enjoy swimming.
If you have an "Inner Tube," a "Swimming Float," a "Dolphin Suit" or a "Shark Suit,"\n you can use those items to enjoy swimming.
If you have an "Inner Tube," a "Swimming Float," a "Dolphin Suit" or a "Shark Suit,"\n you can use those items to enjoy swimming.
If you have an "Inner Tube," a "Swimming Float," a "Dolphin Suit" or a "Shark Suit,"\n you can use those items to enjoy swimming.
一緒に泳ぐ相手を募集するには 以下のいずれかのアイテムが必要です\n「浮き袋・マット」「浮き袋・イルカ」「浮き袋・シャチ」\n（ほかの人の誘いに乗る場合は 持っていなくても参加できます）

Um nach jemanden zu suchen, der mit dir schwimmt, brauchst du einen der folgenden Gegenstände
"Luftmatratze",
"Schwimmtier, Delfin" oder "Schwimmtier, Schwertwal"
(Um auf die Anfrage von jemandem zu reagieren, brauchst du keinen dieser Gegenstände)

To search for someone to swim with, one of the following items is required
"Swimming Float, Mat",
"Swimming Float, Dolphin" or "Swimming Float, Orca"
(To respond to someone else's invitation, you can participate without the items)

Pour rechercher quelqu'un avec qui nager, il vous faut l'un des objets suivants
"Flotteur de nage, matelas",
"Flotteur de nage, dauphin" ou "Flotteur de nage, orque"
(Pour répondre à l'invitation de quelqu'un d'autre, vous pouvez participer sans les objets)

Per cercare qualcuno con cui nuotare insieme, occorre possedere uno dei seguenti oggetti:
"Materassino gonfiabile",
"Delfino gonfiabile" o "Orca gonfiabile"
(Nel caso si risponda all'invito di qualcuno, è possibile partecipare anche senza questi oggetti)

Para buscar a alguien con quien nadar, se necesita uno de los siguientes artículos.\n"colchoneta hinchable", "delfín hinchable" u "orca hinchable"\n(Para responder a la invitación de alguien, puedes participar sin los artículos)

To search for someone to swim with, one of the following items is required
"Swimming Float, Mat",
"Swimming Float, Dolphin" or "Swimming Float, Orca"
(To respond to someone else's invitation, you can participate without the items)
